entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is concerned about Hermione's disappearance.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and companion who shares his concerns about Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the third member of the trio who has gone missing.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a rival student who is suspected by Ron to be involved in Hermione's disappearance.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is the location where Harry and Ron go to look for Hermione.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait that guards the entrance to Gryffindor Tower.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Hermione's disappearance.
Ron shares Harry's concern about Hermione's disappearance.
Ron suspects Malfoy to be involved in Hermione's disappearance.
Harry and Ron go to Gryffindor Tower to look for Hermione.
Harry and Ron go to Gryffindor Tower to look for Hermione.
